021import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.TNEDialect;
022import org.intellij.lang.annotations.Language;
023
024/**
025 * MariaDialect
026 *
027 * @author creatorfromhell
028 * @since 0.1.2.0
029 */
030public class MariaDialect implements TNEDialect {
031
032  public static final String requirement = "10.7.0";
033
034  //The load and save queries
035  @Language("SQL")
036  protected final String saveName;
037
038  @Language("SQL")
039  protected final String loadAccounts;
040
041  @Language("SQL")
042  protected final String loadAccount;
043
044  @Language("SQL")
045  protected final String saveAccount;
046
047  @Language("SQL")
048  protected final String loadNonPlayer;
049
050  @Language("SQL")
051  protected final String saveNonPlayer;
052
053  @Language("SQL")
054  protected final String loadPlayer;
055
056  @Language("SQL")
057  protected final String savePlayer;
058
059  @Language("SQL")
060  protected final String loadMembers;
061
062  @Language("SQL")
063  protected final String saveMember;
064
065  @Language("SQL")
066  protected final String loadHoldings;
067
068  @Language("SQL")
069  protected final String saveHolding;
070
071  @Language("SQL")
072  protected final String loadReceipts;
073
074  @Language("SQL")
075  protected final String saveReceipt;
076
077  @Language("SQL")
078  protected final String loadReceiptHolding;
079
080  @Language("SQL")
081  protected final String saveReceiptHolding;
082
083  @Language("SQL")
084  protected final String loadParticipants;
085
086  @Language("SQL")
087  protected final String saveParticipant;
088
089  @Language("SQL")
090  protected final String loadModifiers;
091
092  @Language("SQL")
093  protected final String saveModifier;
094
095  protected final String prefix;
096
097  public MariaDialect(final String prefix) {
098
099    this.prefix = prefix;
100
101    this.saveName = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "player_names (uid, username) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = ?";
102
103    this.loadAccounts = "SELECT uid AS uid, username, account_type, created, pin, status FROM " + prefix + "accounts";
104
105    this.loadAccount = "SELECT username, account_type, created, pin, status FROM " + prefix + "accounts WHERE uid = ?";
106
107    this.saveAccount = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "accounts (uid, username, account_type, created, pin, status)" +
108                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = ?, pin = ?, status = ?";
109
110    this.loadNonPlayer = "SELECT owner AS owner FROM " + prefix + "non_players_accounts WHERE uid = ?";
111
112    this.saveNonPlayer = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "non_players_accounts (uid, owner) VALUES (?, ?) " +
113                         "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE owner = ?";
114
115    this.loadPlayer = "SELECT last_online FROM " + prefix + "players_accounts WHERE uid = ?";
116
117    this.savePlayer = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "players_accounts (uid, last_online) VALUES (?, ?) " +
118                      "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_online = ?";
119
120    this.loadMembers = "SELECT uid AS uid, perm, perm_value FROM " + prefix + "account_members WHERE account = ?";
121
122    this.saveMember = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "account_members (uid, account, perm, perm_value) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) " +
123                      "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE perm_value = ?";
124
125    this.loadHoldings = "SELECT region, currency AS currency, holdings_type, holdings FROM " + prefix +
126                        "holdings WHERE uid = ? AND server = ?";
127
128    this.saveHolding = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "holdings (uid, server, region, currency, holdings_type, holdings) " +
129                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE holdings = ?";
130
131    this.loadReceipts = "SELECT uid AS uid, performed, receipt_type, receipt_source, receipt_source_type, archive, voided FROM " +
132                        prefix + "receipts";
133
134    this.saveReceipt = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts (uid, performed, receipt_type, receipt_source, " +
135                       "receipt_source_type, archive, voided) " +
136                       "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE archive = ?, voided = ?";
137
138    this.loadReceiptHolding = "SELECT participant AS participant, ending, server, region, " +
139                              "currency AS currency, holdings_type, holdings FROM " +
140                              prefix + "receipts_holdings WHERE uid = ? AND participant = ? AND ending = ?";
141
142    this.saveReceiptHolding = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_holdings (uid, participant, ending, " +
143                              "server, region, currency, holdings_type, holdings) " +
144                              "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid=uid";
145
146    this.loadParticipants = "SELECT participant AS participant, participant_type, tax FROM " +
147                            prefix + "receipts_participants WHERE uid = ?";
148
149    this.saveParticipant = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_participants (uid, participant, participant_type, tax) " +
150                           "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid=uid";
151
152    this.loadModifiers = "SELECT participant AS participant, participant_type, operation, region, " +
153                         "currency AS currency, modifier FROM " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers WHERE uid = ? AND participant = ? AND participant_type = ?";
154
155    this.saveModifier = "INSERT INTO " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers (uid, participant, participant_type, operation, region, currency, modifier) " +
156                        "VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid = uid";
157
158  }
159
160  @Override
161  public String accountsTable() {
162
163    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "accounts (\n" +
164           "    uid UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
165           "    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
166           "    account_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
167           "    created DATETIME NOT NULL,\n" +
168           "    pin VARCHAR(16),\n" +
169           "    status VARCHAR(36)\n" +
170           "    );";
171  }
172
173  @Override
174  public String accountsNonPlayerTable() {
175
176    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "non_players_accounts (\n" +
177           "    uid UUID NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
178           "    owner UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
179           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE,\n" +
180           "    FOREIGN KEY(owner) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
181           "    );";
182  }
183
184  @Override
185  public String accountsPlayerTable() {
186
187    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "players_accounts (\n" +
188           "    uid UUID NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
189           "    last_online DATETIME NOT NULL,\n" +
190           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
191           "    );";
192  }
193
194  @Override
195  public String accountMembersTable() {
196
197    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "account_members (\n" +
198           "    uid UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
199           "    account UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
200           "    perm VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,\n" +
201           "    perm_value TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
202           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE,\n" +
203           "    FOREIGN KEY(account) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
204           "    );";
205  }
206
207  @Override
208  public String holdingsTable() {
209
210    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "holdings (\n" +
211           "    uid UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
212           "    server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
213           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
214           "    currency UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
215           "    holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
216           "    holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
217           "    UNIQUE(`uid`, `server`, `region`, `currency`, `holdings_type`),\n" +
218           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "accounts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
219           "    );";
220  }
221
222  @Override
223  public String receiptsTable() {
224
225    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts (\n" +
226           "    uid UUID NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
227           "    performed DATETIME NOT NULL,\n" +
228           "    receipt_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
229           "    receipt_source VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL,\n" +
230           "    receipt_source_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
231           "    archive TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
232           "    voided TINYINT(1) NOT NULL\n" +
233           "    );";
234  }
235
236  @Override
237  public String receiptsHoldingsTable() {
238
239    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_holdings (\n" +
240           "    uid UUID NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n" +
241           "    participant UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
242           "    ending TINYINT(1) NOT NULL,\n" +
243           "    server VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
244           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
245           "    currency UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
246           "    holdings_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,\n" +
247           "    holdings DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
248           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "receipts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
249           "    );";
250  }
251
252  @Override
253  public String receiptsParticipantsTable() {
254
255    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_participants (\n" +
256           "    uid UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
257           "    participant UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
258           "    participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
259           "    tax DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL,\n" +
260           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "receipts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE\n" +
261           "    );";
262  }
263
264  @Override
265  public String receiptsModifiersTable() {
266
267    return "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " + prefix + "receipts_modifiers (\n" +
268           "    uid UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n" +
269           "    participant UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
270           "    participant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
271           "    operation VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,\n" +
272           "    region VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,\n" +
273           "    currency UUID NOT NULL,\n" +
274           "    modifier DECIMAL(49, 4) NOT NULL," +
275           "    FOREIGN KEY(uid) REFERENCES " + prefix + "receipts(uid) ON DELETE CASCADE" +
276           "    );";
277  }
278
279  @Override
280  public @Language("SQL") String accountPurge(final int days) {
281
282    final String acc = prefix + "accounts";
283    final String players = prefix + "players_accounts";
284
285    return "DELETE FROM " + acc +
286           "WHERE uid IN (" +
287           "  SELECT uid FROM " + players +
288           "  WHERE EXISTS (" +
289           "    SELECT *" +
290           "    FROM " + acc +
291           "    WHERE " + acc + ".uid = " + players + ".uid" +
292           "    AND DATEDIFF(DAY, " + players + ".last_online, NOW()) >= " + days +
293           "  )" +
294           ");";
295  }
296
297  @Override
298  public @Language("SQL") String receiptPurge(final int days) {
299
300    return "DELETE FROM " + prefix + "receipts WHERE archived = false" +
301           "AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), performed) >= " + days;
302  }
303
304  @Override
305  public @Language("SQL") String saveName() {
306
307    return saveName;
308  }
309
310  @Override
311  public @Language("SQL") String loadAccounts() {
312
313    return loadAccounts;
314  }

319    return loadAccount;
320  }

326  }

337    return saveNonPlayer;
338  }

343    return loadPlayer;

355    return loadMembers;
356  }

361    return saveMember;

423
424  @Override
425  public String parseVersion(final String version) {
426
427    return version.split("-")[1];
428  }
429
430  @Override
431  public String requirement() {
432
433    return requirement;
434  }
